Mod3_Description: Whenever a single cast of {c_important}Barrage{/c} ricochets at least {c_number}{SF_36}{/c} times, your next cast gains {c_number}[{SF_35}*100|%+|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Chance.
Mod2_Description: Every {c_number}3rd{/c} cast of {c_important}Barrage{/c} makes enemies {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_8}{/c} seconds.
Mod1_Description: {c_important}Barrage's{/c} ricochet chance is increased to {c_number}100%{/c} for arrows that damage a {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} enemy or Critically Strike any enemy.
name: Barrage
